ingredients: 6 tablespoons (3/4 stick) butter or margarine, softened
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. In large mixer bowl, beat peanut butter and butter until smooth, about 1 minute. Add sugar, eggs and vanilla extract; beat until creamy. Gradually beat in flour and salt. Stir in 1 cup milk chocolate morsels. Spread in ungreased 13x9-inch baking pan. Bake 25 to 30 minutes until the edges begin to brown. Immediately sprinkle remaining 1 cup milk chocolate morsels over top. Let stand 5 minutes or until morsels become shiny and soft; spread evenly over top. When cool, refrigerate 5 to 10 minutes to set chocolate. Cut into 1½-inch squares.
